ygData.subject: Upgrading armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Recently, I have started upgrading my armor. I lack steel plate helm and boots for all the visual slots. The rest I will fill with stat increasing items.
ygData.messageBody:
Recently, I have started upgrading my armor. I lack steel plate helm and
boots for all the visual slots. The rest I will fill with stat increasing
items. However, I have several pieces of equipment I need to sell and have
NO IDEA what they are worth in cash. I have no interest in trading for items
as I will be in the same boat I am now. Cash is what I need so please
respond with the cash value of items listed. I understand different servers
may have different economics, and will keep that in mind.

1. Blackened Iron Crown (yes, i know its cool, but i want to cover my ugly
mug with a nice plate helm)
2. Drake Hide Leggings
3. Blackened Iron Tunic
4. Bladed Thulian Claws (i love these things, but have changed over to blunt
weapons)

thx
Acinonyx Lanoche - Bristlebane
